column5: hey just wondering how i can close/delete my account on here. A link would be great thanks
Why would anyone want too?  You just have to ignore GCD
Im not on all that often anymore nothing personal just ready to give it up.

Part of the terms when you signed up stated that account deletion was not an option. A deleted account does not do anything to your previous posts, so account deletion is essentially doing nothing. They stay there. Your best option if you don't want to participate is to just not post.
You can check out any time you like... But you can never leave...
Thanks Cliff....now I have the solo after that line stuck in my head.
ok thanks...could be a good thing...who knows when ill get the bug to come on OFC and want to post or something like that..better safe then sorry.
We're open 24/7 Stop in and say hi.
The only way to get out of your 'contract' is to be banned.not that i would know about such a thing though.
All you're internets belong to us.  lulz

always...better safe than sorry  welcome Back!    heard rumour there is NO escaping this place--you"ll never get out of here alive--LOL    others before US have tried...to no avail the Legend goes:  "insert overplayed guitar solo here"  cue the OFC Community Anthem --at your leisure  Cheers
those aren't the same terms i agreed to when i signed up way back when as user #56.
"Plenty of room at the Hotel OFNer......  Who's idea was it to post that tune that I cannot now stop whistlin
Actually they are. The terms have not changed since this board's inception.
